channel.title: git on Anant Code
channel.description: Recent content in git on Anant Code

item.title: Git - Remove Tracking Branches that are no longer on remote
item.description: The remote tracking branches may still exist in your local after a feature branch is merged(to a main branch) and deleted from remote (the normal pull request, merge request) The corresponding local branches too may exist and pile up locally, if you are too lazy to delete them. Is there a way to use the information available on remote (say only main branch exists on remote (the longest living branch.)) -

item.title: Some cool Git Shortcuts
item.description: Use this to improve how you use git

item.title: GitHub Contribution not counted!
item.description: Found the reason why GitHub did not count my commits as contributions!

item.title: Bash Script to switch Git Configs
item.description: Switch from global git configs (user.name, user.email, commit.gpgsign) to your preferred git configs of your personal repos, using this shell script

item.title: Renaming remote git repo
item.description: How to keep things working in your local git repo, if you changed name of its remote repo
